name: AYOP
headerTaglineTwo: We are a community that runs At Our Own Pace.

activities.title: Own Pace Monday
activities.description: Every Monday at 7pm, we deliver structured, coach-led interval training that builds rhythm, consistency, and long-term progress â€” together on the track.

activities.title: City To Trail
activities.description: Once a month, we guide you out of the city and into the dirt with slow, social long runs designed for exploration, endurance, and connection.

activities.title: Lunch & Learn
activities.description: In 45-minute online sessions, we bring voices from running, culture, and creativity to share stories, insights, and ideas you can carry into your own practice.

activities.title: Bridge The Gap
activities.description: Through curated run-led events, we connect communities, cultures, and brands â€” using movement as the starting point for meaningful exchange.

teamMissions.Partnership: We create meaningful events and partnerships that connect communities, brands, and culture â€” building real value through shared experiences, not just visibility.
teamMissions.Media: We document and translate the AYOP experience through visuals and storytelling, capturing the emotion, movement, and culture that live beyond the run itself.
teamMissions.Track: We design and deliver structured, inclusive training that meets runners where they are â€” building rhythm, confidence, and long-term progression at every pace.

aboutpara:
A community that celebrates growth at your pace.
We run with our lives, our rhythms, and our choices â€” shaping a culture where every step reflects who we are.
manifesto:
A crew, a community, a movement.
At your own pace, we find our improvement.
Not a race, not a chase â€” this is our space.
No chasing. No changing.
We rise while remaining.
The rat race dangles,
but it won't shape our angles.

We run the streets â€” city beats beneath our feet.
We run the track â€” rhythm over records, never looking back.
We run the trails â€” where the air grows thin and the spirit prevails.

Some days fast, some days slow,
still we move, still we grow.

Step by step, stride by stride,
freedom and joy are what we ride.

Together we run. Together we rise.
No one alone. No one denied.

AYOP.
At Your Own Pace. Always.
